author: Eliza Mackintosh, CNN
title: What you need to know about coronavirus on Tuesday, March 24
description: Authorities are planning to lift a mass quarantine on the central Chinese city, where the global coronavirus outbreak began, on April 8, more than two months after it was sealed off from the outside world -- a hopeful sign that the virus can be defeated.
content:
A version of this story appeared in the March 24 edition of CNN's Coronavirus: Fact vs. Fiction newsletter. Sign up here to receive the need-to-know headlines every weekday.
